======Sets shotgun piercing.======

= Description =

Controls how many aliens shotgun pellets will pierce. Set to 0 to disable.

This cvar will only have an effect if the damage for the shotgun pellets is high enough to kill an alien and still have some damage left AND <!--[asw_shotgun_pierce_chance]-->[[asw_shotgun_piercing_chance.wiki|asw_shotgun_piercing_chance]] is a reasonable value.
